title: PES Lateral Entry????
content: I live in Chandigarh and currently planning on applying to Lateral entry in PES through their PES Entrance exam. I want to do my Btech in ECE. I want to know your experience on joining pes through lateral entry and also about what exactly to expect on the test :)

comments.body: PES has removed PESSAT this year onwards. Only entry through JEE/KCET.
Not for diploma holders (lateral entry candidates)
Are you sure? They just mentioned they discontinued PESSAT for B.Tech courses which implies for lateral entry too I suppose.
dude I literally have a slot on 15 April on their site wdym ðŸ˜­
